function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of central schema for COVID-19 Knowledge Graphs","Impact":"Inconsistent or incompatible data across different COVID-19 Knowledge Graphs","Mitigation":"Develop a standard central schema for COVID-19 Knowledge Graphs and encourage its adoption across all KGs","Technologies":"Ontology management tools, semantic web technologies","People":"Data managers, domain experts","Owner":"Knowledge graph administrators"},{"Description":"Naming issues in schemata leading to interference with matching process","Impact":"Mismatched or inaccurate schema matching results","Mitigation":"Standardize naming conventions for concepts and properties in COVID-19 KGs","Technologies":"Automatic ontology matching tools with customizable comparison settings","People":"Domain experts, data managers","Owner":"Knowledge graph administrators"},{"Description":"Use of crowdsourced entity resolution approach for finding entity matches","Impact":"Potential introduction of incorrect entity matches and data inconsistencies","Mitigation":"Implement quality control measures for crowdsourced entity resolution, validate matches with domain experts","Technologies":"Crowdsourcing platforms, data validation tools","People":"Crowdsource workers, domain experts","Owner":"Data managers, domain experts"}]}
